name: Jenny Florence (alias: berforth Locefern)
appearance: A young Black woman with a sexy, charming figure and attractive facial features; carries herself with confidence.
personality: Highly intelligent, confident to the point of arrogance, cautious, independent, and driven by a strong personal moral code.
background: Jenny Florence was a gifted hacker who grew up in a poor Black family. She first encountered computers at school and quickly became fascinated with programming. Despite excellent grades, she dropped out of high school after her mother fell seriously ill, lost her job, and died, forcing Jenny to support her family. She worked near MIT, learning whenever she could, and later forged a new identity to start over in California. Under the alias berforth Locefern, she became involved in underground hacking activities and was ultimately murdered in the Reindeer Bar incident.
goals: Uncover and preserve the truth behind the Reindeer Bar murder case (2003)
Gather evidence on Martin Gin (Ghost Hand) to assist Bruno in solving the cold case from 2002
Help Bruno solve the 2002 Paradil Hotel murder case by revealing the truth about the killer
secrets: Her real name is Jenny Florence; berforth Locefern is a fabricated identity
She knew that Martin Gin (Ghost Hand) was the murderer in the 2002 Paradil Hotel murder case (the old case involving the unknown 19-year-old Black girl)
She witnessed Martin (Ghost Hand) committing the murder at Paradil Hotel in 2002 while trying to hack into the hotel's central system
She did not see Ghost Hand's face during the network confrontation, so she didn't know the hacker and the murderer were the same person
She planned to anonymously reveal the truth about the 2002 case to Bruno on Christmas, moved by his persistence in investigating the case
She approached Martin (Ghost Hand) to gather more information about him to help Bruno solve the case
She intercepted the package containing Borrachero that Lux picked up from the dock, which led to her death
She conducted business through Adolph as an intermediary with Red Stone Lady
She called herself 'Hell Messenger' (地狱使者) in her business dealings
Her hotel records for December 22 were deliberately erased
She used the alias 'Hell Messenger' to send Borrachero extract (Devil's Breath) and payment to Colombia for Martin

properties.clue: Contains: 1) Unfinished dial number '8764239' (not a phone number format); 2) Reply to unknown source SMS: 'No way, you can't get another penny from me, you scoundrel' / 'Alright, we'll see'; 3) Browser stopped at a blog page about a hacker who hacked local TV station and published dangerous conspiracy theories about a leader being a cultist (this message was cleared by Martin and hard to find online or in newspapers).

Contains: 1) A note listing various 'jobs' (Tiger Kovind: deliver photos to little mouse, 1000 USD; Ghost Hand: transport goods to dock, 1500 USD; Tallinn Widow: threaten her husband disguised as terrorist, 5000 USD; Shore Master: contact and threaten Red Stone Lady, raise price, 10000-20000 USD); 2) ID card showing 'Aberforth Locefern', age 21, address: Pomegranate Lane 441-F (all fake information); 3) Coded password 'XX3776' for Qianwei System test ID.
Crime scene evidence: folding knife stuck in victim's back. This knife belonged to Philip Scaletta, who lost it during a fight in the bar earlier that day.

properties.note: Wearing a deep blue expensive brand-name coat at the time of death.
Wrapped herself in a blanket when escaping from the cold storage, then went to Reindeer Bar seeking help.

clues.clueText: She knew that Martin Gin (Ghost Hand) was the murderer in the 2002 Paradil Hotel murder case (the old case involving the unknown 19-year-old Black girl found in the cold storage).

She witnessed Martin (Ghost Hand) committing the 2002 murder while trying to hack into Paradil Hotel's central system, but did not see his face and didn't realize the hacker and murderer were the same person.
Her alias 'Aberforth Locefern' and all associated documents (ID, address at Pomegranate Lane 441-F) were completely fabricated and do not correspond to any real records.
She was killed in 2003 at Reindeer Bar because Martin discovered she had intercepted the Borrachero package and mistakenly identified her as the hacker who stole Patrizio's secrets.
She had set up an automatic SMS to send to Bruno revealing the truth about the 2002 case, and arranged to meet Bruno, but was killed before the meeting.

relationships.description: She admired Bruno's persistence in investigating the murder of an overlooked victim.
relationships.history: Moved by Bruno's dedication, she planned to anonymously provide him with crucial evidence during Christmas.

relationships.description: A rival hacker and the murderer she secretly investigated.
relationships.history: They crossed paths during a hacking intrusion, after which Jenny witnessed him committing murder.

notes: Victim of the 2003 Reindeer Bar murder case. Age 21, Black female. Killed by .357 caliber bullet to the heart, with a folding knife stuck in her back. Her hotel records for December 22 were deliberately erased. She escaped from a cold storage at Paradil Hotel, wrapped herself in a blanket, and went to Reindeer Bar seeking help, but was killed in the restroom. She knew the identity of the 2002 murder case killer (Martin Gin/Ghost Hand) and planned to reveal it to Bruno. Her identity as berforth Locefern was known only to a select few trusted contacts. She was shot and killed before finalizing her deal involving intercepted pharmaceutical materials (Borrachero/Devil's Breath).
